short_summary: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for an office fit-up for the CRA offices in Saint John, NB.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for an office fit-up for the CRA offices in Saint John, NB. \\(List of the pre-qualified firms invited that qualified under the Architectural Supply Arrangement E0225-15229 in no particular order are as follows:1. TOSS Architecture Inc.\2. Fowler Bauld & Mitchell Ltd.\)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

### Title

*English: RFP Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) Postal Station A Consolidation
*French: Agence du revenu du Canada (ARC) succursale postale A consolidation*

*Reference Number: WS3856081042-Doc3856619270*
*Amendment Number: 1*
*Solicitation Number: WS3856081042*

### Notice Details

*Publication Date: February 3, 2023*
*Tender Closing Date: February 13, 2023, at 14:00:00*
*Amendment Date: February 7, 2023*
*Expected Contract Start Date: February 20, 2023*

### Tender Information

*CRA has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) under Supply Arrangement E0225-152290 for the interior design or decorating of the CRA offices in Saint John, New Brunswick, Canada.*
*The purpose of this RFP is to obtain a comprehensive proposal for a office fit-up project.*
*This RFP is a selective tendering process.*

### Evaluation Criteria

*The selection will be based on a combined rating of a technical merit and price.*

### Solicitation Methods

*This tender is open to all qualified firms eligible under the Supply Arrangement E0225-152290.*

### Trade Agreements

*This tender may be subject to Canada's Free Trade Agreements, including Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).*

### Regions of Delivery

*New Brunswick*

### Contact Information

*Name: Miller, Rachel (SPAC/PSPC)*
*Email: rachel.miller@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca*
*Phone: Not Available*

### Relevant Documents

*PublicServicesandProcurementCanadaPSPCinteriorDesignOrDecoratingArchitecturalSupplyArrangementE0225–152290.pdf*


Let me know if you want any other rewrites.
